Text: Abu kʼi nʼo̩jo̩ pe̩ e̩gba kʼi ño̩ mugudu nyi Kapanahum ge̩, ma ro̩ ka kʼi dʼunyi.
Tak amone̩ wewe jeju jo̩, todabe̩le̩ i chaka chʼalugbo̩na, uña ño̩ de̩ ge̩ n; oñ i ka o̩la le̩ ñwu ma.
Ma lewa mʼe̩no̩ga ekuto̩laʼka du wʼugbo-wñ, one̩ me̩le̩ ne̩ wa.
Abu ku ma ma neke me̩rʼu todu o̩wo̩ amone̩ ki tinyo̩ jʼo̩mo̩ n, ma mʼojokunyi ugbo kʼi de̩ gudu; oñ abu ku ma fʼu kpo̩fo̩, ma mʼakpata kʼe̩no̩ga ekuto̩la le̩ dachi oji-wñ du lʼo̩mo̩ tane̩.
Oñ abu ku Jisus li e̩do̩ ku ma konʼo, i ka ñw e̩no̩ga ekuto̩la le̩ kakini, O̩ma, ma tʼadure-we̩ no̩ me̩.
Amako̩takada iche̩ka muda gugu o̩mo̩, ma jʼakpibe ef e̩do̩-ma kakini,
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ne̩-i ako̩la abe̩i? I achakpabie̩ O̩jo̩. E̩ne̩ neke tʼadure no̩ chai e̩ne̩ʼkate? owñ chʼO̩jo̩.
Ababale̩ abu ku Jisus chema ef afu-wñ ku ma kpibe abe̩le̩ ef uma, i ka ñwu ma, kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ kpibe e̩wñ-i ef e̩do̩-me̩?
Kali e-ki tukpo̩ eka ñw e̩no̩ga ekuto̩la-i, Ma tʼadure-we̩ no̩ me̩; abe̩ku Kwane̩, mʼakpata-we̩ du kʼe̩ lule̩?
Ama todu ku me̩ ki ma ka kʼO̩ma One̩ chenʼo̩da ane̩ ile̩ kʼi atʼadure one̩ no̩ ñw u, (i ka ñw e̩no̩ga ekuto̩la le̩) kakini,
Naka ñw e̩, kwane̩, mʼakpata-we̩ du kʼe̩ lo tʼunyi we̩.
Oñ i kwane̩, i mʼakpata-wñ du ababa, oñ i ledufu eju-ma chaka; todabe̩le̩ ibe-ma chaka mukpatuka, ma kwodojima ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, A li e̩wñ abe̩i mama ta n.
I ño̩ dabi dufu nyʼeti ohimini ge̩, o̩gbo̩ amone̩ le̩ du wʼugbo-wñ, oñ i ko̩ ma e̩wñ.
Abu kʼi alale, i fu Lifai o̩ma Alfio̩s li abu kʼi gugu ugbo ku ma gba o̩kane̩. Tak i ka ñw u, kakini, Tʼumi ubi. Oñ i kwane̩ tʼo̩ ubi.
Oñ ileatu abu kʼi chekukane̩ aje̩-wñ ef unyi-wñ, kʼamagbo̩kane̩ kpai ame̩nadure wewe chekukane̩ kpai Jisus kpai amako̩che̩-wñ; todu ma che̩wewe, oñ ma rʼo̩ ubi.
E̩gba kʼamako̩takada e-amaFarisi li ka kʼi aje̩wñ kpai ame̩nadure kpai amagbo̩kane̩, ma ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, I ajʼe̩wñ, i año̩ ñmo̩ kpai amagbo̩kane̩ kpai ame̩nadure?
E̩gba ku Jisus gbo̩ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Eku obochi ku abo kʼo̩la-ma gbiti n, chai abo ki acho̩ga. Omi wa kʼu do̩ abo̩kpakpa n, chai ame̩nadure.
Amako̩che̩ Jo̩n kpai amaFarisi jʼajialu; oñ ma lewa ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼamako̩che̩ Jo̩n kpai amako̩che̩ amaFarisi ajialu, amako̩che̩-we̩ la jialu n?
Oñ Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Abokolobia o̩ko̩ya etito̩ neke jialu abu kʼo̩ko̩ya etito̩ dʼugbo ma? Abu kʼo̩ko̩ya etito̩ dʼugbo ma, ma neke jialu n.
Ama o̩jo̩-wñ awa, e̩gba ku ma adʼo̩ko̩ya etito̩ kwʼugbo ma, o̩jo̩ le̩ taku ma ajialu.
E̩ne̩ du abʼukpo ki ma ro̩nyi ta n gamo̩ afe̩ igbele n; cho̩kpo̩ni e-kʼi dukpe̩ kʼi aboma afa kwʼef uwñ, e-etito̩ afʼe-igbele, tak efana-wñ abie̩ne̩ tule.

E̩ne̩ du adʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ danyʼaiko igbele n; cho̩kpo̩ni omi achiwebe̩te̩ma afʼaiko kpana, tak omi achiwebe̩te̩ma achihi kpai aiko-wñ; ma muda adʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ danyʼaiko etito̩.
Oñ ileatu abu kʼi alale gu ef uche̩-o̩ka du o̩jo̩ uñmi, kʼamako̩che̩-wñ chane̩ ejʼoji o̩ka da abu ku ma alo.
Tak amaFarisi ka ñw u kakini, Go, e̩wñ chi ku ma che e̩wñ kʼo̩da ma je̩ n o̩jo̩ uñmi?
I ka ñwu ma, kakini, E̩wñ ku Defid che e̩gba kʼeku e̩wñ akʼu, kʼebi nakpʼo̩, uwñ kpai abo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ, me̩ cho̩kalatu o̩la le̩ mama ta n?
Abu kʼi gudu tef unyi O̩jo̩ adiko kʼAbayata chʼagboji amatama kʼi la je̩ akala ku ma ko te̩ jʼo̩mo̩ e-kʼo̩da ma je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du je̩ n, chai amatama, i laño̩ ko ñw abo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ kpo̩fo̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Ma fʼo̩jo̩ uñmi che todu one̩, i chʼone̩ ma che tod o̩jo̩ uñmi n;
todabe̩le̩ O̩ma One̩ chʼOndu o̩jo̩ uñmi kpo̩fo̩.
